original_title: UFC Fight Night 88: Almeida vs. Garbrandt
overview: UFC Fight Night 88: Almeida vs. Garbrandt was a mixed martial arts event held on May 29, 2016, at the Mandalay Bay Events Center in Las Vegas, Nevada. A bantamweight bout between top undefeated prospects Thomas Almeida and Cody Garbrandt headlined the event.
title: UFC Fight Night 88: Almeida vs. Garbrandt
